article.description: James "J-Byrd" Daniel III scored 38 points, hitting 16 of 23 free throws, and Howard beat Maryland-Eastern Shore 77-74 Tuesday night.
article.headline: James "J-Byrd" Daniel III scores 38, Howard edges UMES 77-74
article.linkText: James "J-Byrd" Daniel III scores 38, Howard edges UMES 77-74
article.story: WASHINGTON -- James "J-Byrd" Daniel III scored 38 points, hitting 16 of 23 free throws, and Howard beat Maryland-Eastern Shore 77-74 Tuesday night. Daniel, a junior, became the school's all-time leading scorer with 1,755 points -- topping Aaron Shingler (1,724) from 1963-67. Daniel was 10 of 19 from the field as Howard made 51 percent of its shots. Maryland-Eastern Shore had a 2-0 lead -- its largest of the game -- before Daniel scored the next eight points and Howard led by as many as 11 on a Daniel free throw with 9:24 remaining in the game. He scored 11 of Howard's first 15 points and had 22 at the break. Devin Martin pulled Maryland-Eastern Shore within 74-71 with 18 seconds left but Tyler Stone went 3 for 4 at the line on Howard's next two possessions to ice it. Stone finished with 12 points and Damon Collins 11 for Howard (11-15, 5-6 Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference). Martin finished with 26 points and Dominique Elliott had 19 points and 12 rebounds for Maryland-Eastern Shore (8-19, 5-7). The teams combined for 77 free-throw attempts -- with 49 makes -- and totaled 39 turnovers.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
